forum.content:
整首歌都好好聽喔！
最吸引我的一句話
當我失望時再把我拉起
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=638115193042248&id=635127763340991
Every time we touch....
Don't we all need that right person to still in love no matter what happens we'll be there for each other never be alone~
But I guess I'd just have to look harder to find that person!!! Whom is welling to be the same!
forum.title: Every time we touch.....
